reviews.review: this game has its ups and downs. but overall love the game play with friends

This is no balance between killer and  survivors. Maybe its not obvious in high rank. I don't understand why behaviour digital keep nerfing survivors. And killer is really easy to get a lot of blood points with good game experience. That's cause too many people want to be killers and a few people play survivors. Because the game experience of survivors is really bad and hard to win to get  blood points .So, the killer have to wait a long time to entre the game  , and survivors almost dont need to wait. 
  Now in the Halloween event. The survivors have to pick up the flowers together and repair of motor. But for killer, they just need to hang the  survivors on hooks like what they used do. I don't understand why the developers hate the  survivors so much. I hvae to say, I love this game and I love to be the  survivors. I admit I'm still a rookie. But I feel really tired and sad to be survivors.

- Good Game Play
- Even better if you play with friends
- Nice Graphics

- Some Killer too OP :'(
That it, it's very worth price for a game like this, keep it up
It's like drug addiction. Fun at first, but then slowly ruins your life. Feels good to be sober!

Pretty fun. Not really worth the asking price. just buy it on sale.

I have an incredible love/hate relationship with this game. I have changed my review of this game at least 3 times, switching my scores between recommended and not recommended. This game does a lot of unique stuff, and each update brings new stuff to the table. With a lot of customization options, each match feels unique. However, there are often balance decisions and map designs that are questionable at best. It has used a few different matchmaking systems since I joined, and the matchmaking can really make or break your experience. At it's best, it's a very fun game that makes you feel great for using the multitude of abilities available to you in fun and interesting ways. At it's worst, it's infuriating and makes me wonder why I torture myself with this game. But overall, it's a unique, fun game, and no other game does what this game does. No matter how many times this game makes me furious, between the fairly toxic community and questionable balance decisions, I keep coming back. I have a few hundred hours on this game, and that number is going to continue going up.

EL MEJOR JUEGO DE LA VIDA!

I purchased this game a few years back and let me tell ya, I do not regret this purchase even at the full price.

The basis of the game is simple if you ever watch a typical horror movie. 
Theres a killer
a group of survivors or citizens if you will
and you have to get your way out
if you never have had any experience with this game it is very easy to pick up. 
I play it a lot during halloween and yea it isn't scary but it is totally thrilling. 

I would recommend 9/10

It's a million times better when you have some friends to play with. Go get in a Discord/Skype/Teamspeak call and have fun! It's actually scary when you take it seriously and try to escape

Scratch that 10/10
Simplesmente perfeito. C U N T

I know it's suposed to be a horror game and it definetily feels like one in your first few hours.
After playing for some hours you start to feel less scared and less stressed and it becomes more fun and enjoyable.
I've played this game since the end of september and all i can say is that am addicted.
It's so satisfying everytime you mind-game the opponent, either if you are the killer or a survivor.
The game becomes even greater if you are playing with a couple of friends.

Overall a great game which could suck in some hours.

One of the most brilliant games I've had the chance to play. 
Despite some balancing issues that the developers are consistently faced with due to the ever changing community, this game is rather solid on both sides of the coin, when it comes to being Survivor or Killer. 
However, some things could be adjusted, and perhaps a better graphic engine? 

10/10 for the Thrills. (:
Spoko gierka  grafika ok sama rozgrywka jest nice
Muito bom, melhor ainda com amigos.

Before this review my review of this game was actually bad. I didn't recommend the game beacuse of all the extra DLC you have to pay for to get all characters. I still think it sucks that there is like ‚Ç¨100 or more of paid DLC in a game I've already paid for but, the devs are constantly updating the game and actually trying to make the game better. So even though I'm salty I still think you should play this game. It's great with friends and I actually prefer playing survivor rather than killer. 

Thumbs up to the devs, anyone intrested in this game should play It's fun.
Muy buen juego, Mas si jugas con tus amigos.

It‚Äôs a great concept of a game. I like it, but the constant change in survivor abilities coupled by playing as a killer like ‚ÄúMichael Myers‚Äù And actually winning results in some horrendous hate speech.

It's amazing how much BHVR keeps fucking up their own game. It's so easy to get a game that just isn't fun to play, whether it's a massive discrepancy in rank, broken items and add-ons, garbage map generation, or even players that exclusively grief and somehow get away with it. Every update, they fix 20 bugs, only to introduce 50 more, and completely game breaking bugs somehow aren't a rare occurrence. I used to let it slide because I had way more fun games then bad ones, but nowadays, the fun games seem less fun and the bad games seem way worse. Half of the killers are either impossible to play against or impossible to get kills with, with Nurse and Spirit completely breaking the game entirely, and Pig just being a worse Ghostface. The matchmaking took a sharp dive from 1.8, from "everyone is only 3 or 4 ranks away from each other" to "fuck it, they're divisions apart". I'd rather they just remove half of the ultra rare and very rare items and add-ons entirely, from both sides, because more often than not, they don't make the game any more interesting, they just make the game annoying.
I just played this game first the first time last night.  It's very suspenseful, fun, creepy and gets your adrenaline pumping in no time!  I highly recommend it!

I like this game.
It's a game of freeze tag with some extra rules and a big layer of horror over it. Enjoyable to play most of the time!
Obviously it is a 'player versus player' thing and there will be bad matches sometimes. But I think the good rounds really outweigh the bad!
